metadata.title: CVE-2024-46747 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:HID: cougar: fix slab-out-of-bounds Read in cougar_report_fixupreport_fixup for the Cougar 500k Gaming Keyboard was not verifyingthat the report descriptor size was correct before accessing it

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
